name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Stack Exchange
description: This is a repository of stack exchange APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Stack Exchange
apis.description: After someone asks a question, members of the community propose answers. Others vote on those answers. Very quickly, the answers with the most votes rise to the top. You dont have to read through a lot of discussion to find the best answer.    Like to...
